title: OpenAI Whisper vs Figma AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare OpenAI Whisper vs Figma AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between OpenAI Whisper and Figma AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: OpenAI Whisper vs Figma AI
paragraphs: OpenAI Whisper (audio ai) is OpenAI Whisper is an open-source automatic speech recognition (ASR) system that transcribes and translates speech from audio across dozens of languages. It is designed to be robust to accents, background noise, and technical language, making it highly versatile. Its unique value lies in being a state-of-the-art, general-purpose model that is freely available for both research and commercial use, trained on a massive and diverse 680,000-hour dataset.. It's known for speech-recognition, speech-to-text, audio-transcription.

Figma AI (generative ai) is Figma AI is a suite of integrated, context-aware artificial intelligence features within the collaborative design platform Figma. It assists designers by automating repetitive tasks, generating design elements, and offering intelligent suggestions directly within the design workflow. It uniquely embeds AI into a real-time, multi-player collaborative environment, targeting product designers and teams to accelerate UI/UX design, prototyping, and design system management.. Users choose it for UI Design, UX Design, Collaborative Design.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: OpenAI Whisper: Multilingual transcription for 99+ languages, Speech translation from non-English languages to English, Robust performance in noisy environments and with diverse accents

Figma AI: Auto-layout intelligence for automatic spacing, alignment, and responsive adjustments, Context-aware design suggestions for icons, copy, and visual styles, AI-powered component generation from text prompts (e.g., 'create a settings modal')

verdict: Both OpenAI Whisper and Figma AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: OpenAI Whisper for speech-recognition, Figma AI for UI Design.
